Psychological Strategist: First interactions are crucial for setting tone. Many players tend to cooperate initially unless they have reason not to. Choosing hare guarantees at least 2 points (if they choose hare) or up to 4 points (if they choose stag). The expected value depends on our estimate of their behavior.
